rajola.pipeline.level

Class TileMapLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • rajola.pipeline.level.TileMapLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderable

    public class TileMapLayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Renderable
    Author:
    Frederic-Antoine Gingras The TileMapLayer class represents a tile map layer of rendering this offers the flexibility to overlay different TileSprite, e.g.: a background layer has the "decor" and specific objects like Rocks, Chests, etc. are on an other Layer. It has a name, a priority, and it's tiles
